addon.name: The Mutts Nuts

extension.summary: Been Asked So Many Times, Where Can I Get The Mutt's Nut's[CR]. So HERE is an early RELEASE, SO many people WANT it NOW,[CR]JUST be AWARE that this IS A PRERELEASE,[CR]So YOU WILL GET ERRORS IN SOME PLACES.[CR]IT CAN be put anywhere apart from TOTALXXXX,MY CRAP my CHOICE.
